text: KZCD (94.1 FM) is a radio station broadcasting a Rock format. Also known as Z94, it serves the Lawton, Oklahoma area. It is owned by Townsquare Media. KZCD signed on 1987 as adult contemporary KQLI "Lite 94" and changed its call letters to KZCD in 1993. ==References== ==External links== * ZCD Category:Townsquare Media radio stations
title: KZCD
